nodes.text: An administration building was located within the Eastern Enrichment Zone on the planet of Bandomeer. It was used by the Agricultural Corps, a branch of the Jedi Service Corps tasked with managing the Order's agricultural research. The Meerian RonTha worked there in 44 BBY. The building was connected to the Enrichment Dome used by the AgriCorps to grow the plants needed for their research.
The main administration building was featured in the young adult novel Jedi Apprentice: The Dark Rival, the second book in the Jedi Apprentice series. The Dark Rival was written by Jude Watson.
